H0.text: Which director won the 'Oscar' for best Director for the picture 'A Beautiful Mind' in 2001. Ron Howard

H1.text: Which director won the 'Oscar' for best Director for the picture 'A Beautiful Mind' in 2001. Steven Spielberg

H2.text: Which director won the 'Oscar' for best Director for the picture 'A Beautiful Mind' in 2001. Martin Scorsese

H3.text: Which director won the 'Oscar' for best Director for the picture 'A Beautiful Mind' in 2001. B-Minor

A4.text: Howard was nominated and won Best Director.
